mild_cognitive_decline.label: Mild Memory Changes
mild_cognitive_decline.description: Occasional forgetfulness that may benefit from monitoring

moderate_cognitive_decline.label: Moderate Memory Concerns
moderate_cognitive_decline.description: Noticeable memory or thinking difficulties requiring support

severe_cognitive_risk.label: Severe Memory Impairment
severe_cognitive_risk.description: Alzheimer's, dementia, or severe cognitive issues requiring specialized care

cognitive_severe_any.label: Severe Cognitive Path
cognitive_severe_any.description: Severe memory changes requiring Memory Care evaluation

memory_care_dx.label: Dementia/Alzheimer's Diagnosis
memory_care_dx.description: Formal diagnosis of dementia or Alzheimer's disease confirmed by doctor

likely_mc_no_dx.label: Memory Care Without Diagnosis
likely_mc_no_dx.description: Severe cognitive symptoms present but no formal diagnosis yet

moderate_safety_concern.label: Safety Monitoring Needed
moderate_safety_concern.description: One fall or safety concerns that warrant attention

high_safety_concern.label: High Safety Risk
high_safety_concern.description: Multiple falls or significant safety risks requiring intervention

falls_multiple.label: Multiple Falls
falls_multiple.description: Multiple falls in the past year requiring immediate safety measures

moderate_mobility.label: Mobility Assistance Needed
moderate_mobility.description: Uses cane or walker, may need accessibility modifications

high_mobility_dependence.label: Limited Mobility
high_mobility_dependence.description: Wheelchair or bedbound status requiring accessible environment

moderate_dependence.label: Regular Assistance Needed
moderate_dependence.description: Needs regular help with daily activities

high_dependence.label: Extensive Care Needed
high_dependence.description: Needs extensive full-time support with activities of daily living

veteran_aanda_risk.label: Veteran A&A Eligible
veteran_aanda_risk.description: May qualify for VA Aid & Attendance benefits

moderate_risk.label: Emotional Support Helpful
moderate_risk.description: Emotional ups and downs that could benefit from support

high_risk.label: Mental Health Concern
high_risk.description: Significant emotional distress requiring professional support

mental_health_concern.label: Mental Health Support Needed
mental_health_concern.description: Mental health issues requiring professional attention

chronic_present.label: Chronic Conditions
chronic_present.description: One or more chronic health conditions requiring management

no_support.label: No Caregiver Support
no_support.description: No regular caregiver available, increasing care needs

limited_support.label: Limited Caregiver Availability
limited_support.description: Limited caregiver support may not be sufficient

low_access.label: Limited Service Access
low_access.description: Somewhat isolated location with limited healthcare access

very_low_access.label: Very Limited Access
very_low_access.description: Isolated location with minimal healthcare and service access

geo_isolated.label: Geographic Isolation
geo_isolated.description: Remote location requiring special care arrangements
